item.title: Changing teles
item.dc:creator: @Helixian Helixian
item.description:
@Helixian wrote:

So far im just trying to change a tele. It has three 3 options (done so far), now if someone could tell me where to add the teleport coordinates, id be happy =]

i added the options in clickingmost.java, heres what it looks like:

case 9168: if(c.teleEffect == 1) c.triggerTele(3222, 3218, 0); c.sM("Welcome to Lumbridge!"); if(c.teleEffect == 2) c.triggerTele(3210, 3424, 0); c.sM("Welcome to Varrock!"); if(c.teleEffect == 3) c.triggerTele(2965, 3380, 0); c.sM("Welcome to Falador!"); break;

The Lumbridge Teleport makes me go to somewhere else, Varrock teleports me to Lumbridge, and Falador teleports me to Mage Bank. Any help? I though I got the coordinates right but I guess not.

Read full topic
